resources.string: \t\t\t\t Water Jetpack Fort Myers and Naples area this week! Bringing out the pack today check it out! Beat the heat with some wakeboarding and water jetpacks! We guarantee you fly your first time! Flyboard World Cup Qualifier at Sugden Park in Naples, Florida was Awesome! It\'s only going to get better, 2 more days to go.
